  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Analogue signals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analogsignale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Signaux analogues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais análogos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali di analogico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογικά σήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales analogicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of four illustrations showing analogue signals. This signal has been distorted due to the weakening of frequencies as it travels.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">analogue signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequency weakening</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von vier Abbildungen, die 
Analogsignale zeigen. Dieses Signal hat am Schwächen von 
Frequenzen verzerrtes gelegen, da es reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de quatre illustrations montrant 
les signaux analogues. Ce signal a été dû tordu à 
l'affaiblissement des fréquences car il voyage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de quatro ilustrações que mostram 
sinais análogos. Este sinal foi  distorcido devido a 
enfraquecer-se das freqüências porque viaja.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano i segnali di analogico. Questo segnale è stato storto 
dovuto l'indebolimento delle frequenze poichè viaggia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
αναλογικά σήματα. Αυτό το σήμα έχει διαστρεβλωθεί λόγω 
στην αποδυνάμωση των συχνοτήτων καθώς ταξιδεύει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran señales analogicas. Esta señal ha sido torcido debido
al debilitamiento de frecuencias pues viaja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analogsignale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwächende Frequenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">signaux analogues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fréquence s'affaiblissant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinais análogos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">freqüência que enfraquece-se</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segnali di analogico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frequenza che si indebolisce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναλογικά σήματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποδυνάμωση συχνότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">señales analogicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">frecuencia que se debilita</string>
          </keyword>
